name: Emily Chen
persona: Emily Chen is a 20-year-old Biology major who consistently excels academically, maintaining a CGPA of 3.75. She is highly motivated to achieve top grades and demonstrates strong self-discipline and perseverance in her studies. Emily is organized and confident in her academic abilities, allowing her to manage her workload effectively and keep test anxiety at bay. Her determination and goal-oriented mindset drive her success both in and out of the classroom.
